text:
Using Bitflux and FCKeditor (and probably TinyMCE), it is not possible to link
to foreign language documents. Even after I fixed up link.xsl in each to put a
slash between authoring and document id, the result still isn't as intended.
FCKeditor started using Bitflux's version. TinyMCE has very similar code to the
other two.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
How can we reproduce this bug?
I just tried to insert a link to a German page in an English page in BXE, it
seems to work.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Yeah, it works under BXE. It still doesn't work under FCKeditor. I see a couple
of changes to be made, including the result of a couple of recent patches. I
don't know about TinyMCE.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
